content.en: Global Optimization Algorithms: Researchers have developed algorithms that can find the global minimum of multi-dimensional functions and global minimizers for global integer optimization. These algorithms are based on the filled function method, which is a parameter-free approach for unconstrained global optimization. The algorithms are designed to solve a variety of optimization problems, including non-smooth global optimization problems and constrained global optimization problems.
content.da: Globale optimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer, der kan finde det globale minimum af flerdimensionale funktioner og globale minimizere for global heltalsoptimering. Disse algoritmer er baseret på den fyldte funktionsmetode, som er en parameterfri tilgang til ukonstraint global optimering. Algoritmerne er designet til at løse en række optimeringsproblemer, inklusive ikke-glatte globale optimeringsproblemer og konstraindrede globale optimeringsproblemer.
